mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_pet_info ( user_idx, dog_reg_no, rfid_cd, dog_name, sex, kind_name, neuter_status, organization_name, office_tel, approval_status, profile_url, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{userIdx}, #{dogRegNo}, #{rfidCd}, #{dogNm}, #{sexNm}, #{kindNm}, #{neuterYn}, #{orgNm}, #{officeTel}, #{aprGbNm}, #{profileUrl}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT pet_id, user_idx, dog_reg_no, rfid_cd, dog_name, sex, kind_name, neuter_status, organization_name, office_tel, approval_status, profile_url, created_at, updated_at FROM tb_pet_info WHERE user_idx = #{userIdx}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_pet_info WHERE pet_id = #{petId} AND user_idx = #{userId}
